welcome_message_body: Welcome to Evanston, where charm meets the shores of Lake Michigan! Explore our historic neighborhoods, vibrant arts scene, and world-class dining options as you make the most of your time in our beautiful city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by United Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
